effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
